html:
10.25.18  2:48 pm   Why do you put so many pentagons in your videos?

      Is your favorite shape a pentagon?

      Do they resonate with you on a personal level?
10.25.18  2:16 pm   are you secretly from the future
10.25.18  1:09 pm   how did you decide to create stuff the way you do?

10.25.18  11:21 am   how am i supposed to know what inversion of a chord to play when i'm figuring out the chords by ear, i can get the notes/chord name down but i feel like it kind of goes all over the place and i can't figure out which one is correct or sounds better
10.25.18  9:44 am   what is your favourite flavour of custard
10.25.18  9:44 am   Will you ever sell out?
10.25.18  9:00 am   Is becoming a professional classical musician only for the rich?
10.25.18  7:22 am   How do you deal with annoying people?
10.25.18  6:00 am   What's some music that you like?
10.25.18  4:44 am   But like why is it called a fifth if it's seven semi-tones?? And why is it called a third if it's five semi-tones?????

10.25.18  2:43 am   Hi Bill. I like your music.

Since you have perfect pitch, is it easy to hear a chord and know what it will sound like if just the notes of the chord was written down.

For example, can you hear this chord in you head:

B C# E F#  with F# as the bass note.
10.25.18  2:36 am   how to be a better person? i feel like I am deteriorating morally
10.25.18  2:21 am   Are there places you like visiting to just take a breather?
10.25.18  1:39 am   What's your least favourite type of vegetable?

10.25.18  12:04 am   how do you formulate seemingly nonsensical, one word answers to deep questions about life, existence, humanity, etc. that actually make a lot of sense when you think about them? you do it a lot
10.25.18  12:02 am   What's with you uploading so frequently now?
10.24.18  11:01 pm   what are you going to be for halloween
10.24.18  10:02 pm   Tell us a question that you've asked yourself, and couldn't find an answer to. Maybe we can think about it.
10.24.18  9:58 pm   how long is the next journey?

10.24.18  8:58 pm   i'm attempting to write music myself. when it comes to actually writing it, what do you think is more efficient: writing the music first, writing the lyrics first, or writing both as you go along?

      how do you write your songs?
10.24.18  8:07 pm   Would you run for president?
10.24.18  8:01 pm   Do you feel?
10.24.18  6:26 pm   bill i don't know if this has been asked but what is your favorite car

10.24.18  4:45 pm   is imitation a good method for learning?

      for example remaking a song as close as possible to the original. would this stunt the development of a personal style?
10.24.18  3:20 pm   why are umbrellas curved at the end
10.24.18  2:57 pm   what's the difference between gmiadd9 and gmi9? i saw both of those written and idk if they are the same or not but it seemed to be different

10.24.18  2:15 pm   Bill. Are you ever going to do a live concert?

      I've been wanting to listen to your songs live on stage for a quite a while and I think other fans of you would like to go to one
10.24.18  1:54 pm   What is the most memorable word from the next song?
10.24.18  1:48 pm   I haven't created anything in a long time & I don't know what I want to make but I know I want to make something. How should I start?
10.24.18  1:45 pm   what is not the name of your next song?

10.24.18  1:03 pm   i want to go on a journey (by bike to be specific), but i am not sure if i should go for a short one and be reasonable, or absolutely kill myself trying to go really far. what is your advice for the length of my journey?
10.24.18  11:01 am   i can write lyrics, but i can't sing at all. any good tips for finding your voice?
10.24.18  10:34 am   On the piano,do you use the classic or modified position when playing arpeggios?
10.24.18  9:14 am   If you put a laptop on a desk, does it become a desktop?
10.24.18  6:52 am   i get my period every full moon. what does that mean? am i some sort of beast?
10.24.18  5:57 am   am I mediocre or is it just not for me?
10.24.18  1:57 am   How do you keep creating stuff though it feels so absurd at times?
10.24.18  1:03 am   What does ueqstions mean? Never heard pf that word.
10.23.18  11:01 pm   Are your songs for sale on Google play? Because a apparently you can purchase them on google play
10.23.18  10:23 pm   Are you close to where you wanna be at?
10.23.18  9:33 pm   how long is the next song? please say 2:42

10.23.18  9:05 pm   At the end the of the song, "bryant park", drink tea is what you recommend.

      These days with your schedule so nice and disciplined, do you still drink tea?

      If so, decaffeinated or caffeine for focus? Beautiful song by the way.
10.23.18  8:28 pm   How do we know that we exist?
10.23.18  8:25 pm   should i pursue a career that's secure but kinda boring or something less secure but super fun
10.23.18  8:24 pm   Why don't I feel at peace anymore
10.23.18  7:57 pm   If you could go on a vacation anywhere in the world, where would you go?
10.23.18  7:44 pm   what is the thing you most like of this world?

10.23.18  7:37 pm   Hey Bill, reading the question time logs I noticed it didnt look you got much sleep.

      I hope you can get a good rest soon bud.
10.23.18  7:33 pm   Hey Bill, do you really love The Devil or did you just say that to spruce things up? Don't mean to judge, I'm just curious

10.23.18  7:28 pm   Some friends described me as being "Isolated while growing up" and that being isolated while growing up is a bad thing. Were you isolated while growing up and is it -really- a bad thing?
